title: Institutional investors; balance sheet
maintainer_displayname: ZBO | Centraal Bureau voor de Statistiek
name: institutional-investors-balance-sheet
notes:
This table consists of the balance sheet of institutional investors. It enables analyzing shifts in the balance sheet of institutional investors. This is possible for the total of institutional investors, and for each of the three groups:  pension funds, insurance corporations and non-MMF investment funds.

Data available from: 1998

Status of the figures:
Figures up to 2008 before revision are definitive, figures from 2008 after revision are provisional.

Changes as of 5 February 2015:
This is a new table that replaces the former table with the same title Institutional investors, balance sheet which has been placed in the archive. In 2014, Statistics the Netherlands has conducted a major revision on their macro-economic data. The national accounts have been compiled in accordance with the guidelines and concepts of the new European System of Accounts 2010 (ESA 2010). In addition, new statistical sources and estimation methods have been used during the revision. This table shows the figures from 2008 after revision, the figures up to 2008 have not changed. The break in series has been made visible by showing the figures in the balance sheet for 2008 both before and after revision. 
This table has more detail than the archived table. Where possible the extra detail is also given for the period 1998-2008. Liabilities in the categories debt securities, loans and shares are subdivided by type of lending party. The assets entail the category shares in investment funds. Up to 2005 no figures are available for foreign shares in investment funds. The break in series has been made visible by showing the figures for 2005 both before and after break. 

When will new figures be published?
New figures for 2014 will be added in September 2015. Figures from 2008 will be adjusted when necessary.
